S.FORM: = François Hollande = Mntucing hngkawas 1954 idas 8 jiyax 12 ka François Hollande ga, empklaw ka hiya. Bukung klwaan France ta sayang o kiya ka François Hollande, pnaah hngkawas 2012 idas 5 jiyax 15 pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. His presidential term ended on 14 May 2017. = François Hollande = François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande (kari Franse: François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande; kngkawas 1954 idas 8 diyax 12－), France sey-ji jn-wu, kiya ka brah Soto Franse mi An-taw-r Cing-wang. Ngalan Franse Sya-kay-tang pusu mpdudul niya uri, mnngalan Sya-kay-tang Tu1 Su-ki (tang-kwey) hmrinas 10 knkawas. Kngkawas 2012 Franse So-to seyng-kyo cida mniq tumn2 meytaq hyo wada niya ini baka ka Nikura Sakeci, wada mangal So-to Franse tu24 jn So-to Franse, wada mnFarance Tu5 Konghe dhuq saya tu2 tuiwil palic So-to ka François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande. Kngkawas 2016 idas 12 diyax 1 cida, alaw msngari 4% balay ka c-cng man-yi-tu François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande, kiya uri u wada dha ngalan Tu5 Kong-he ini balay qrasi na So-to ka hiya. So kiya daw so uxay mtdha ka Tuiwil pay, kiya uri u rmngaw kari｀Ida snbeyhing balay quri qnbliqan qnlhangan ka pllayun lmngelung', François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande pa wada so qnnaqah bay kuxul niya kasi palix lmutuc qpahun So-to, wada balay snpeyyah babaw ndanan Tumn2 Knbeyhing Mccbu Qnlangan dhuq cida qnlhangan Franse mwaya balay malax nanaq mplutuc qpahun niya So-to. Ndan cuxal Kngkawas 1954 cida, François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande pa mntuting tudaya Farance alang mkbrnux Rouen, tama niya u ising mpqita narux birac mi muhing mi welu, mntumal 60 kngkkawas uuda Soto seyngkyo, kiya ka cida mpdkuh tunarac balay pay ho-sweyn-jn. Bubu niya ka mpdkuh tuiwil pay na sya-kay mpqpah niya. Kngkawasw 1968 cida, musa thdil Paris ka tnsapah niya François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande, musa mniq Paris mkduriq knsblayaq na balay alang mkbrnux Neuilly. Hana balay han u mniq Paste muyas pyasan tukcka, hiti daw mniq Pyasan Tubeyhing Tu2 Paris mangal ho-ri-cu swey-s swey-wey. Kiya mi lmutuc mangal s-keyng nniqan bay hnhangan na Franse Pyasan Tukaw-tng HEC mi Paris Sey-ji Swe-weyn Science Po lmutuc muyas dungan. Bukuy daw wada mangal s-keyng Qnlhangan Sing-cng Swey-weyn L'ENA. Kngkawas 1980 cida, wada mangal tu7 pnyasan (Voltaire Kay) kndadax Qnlhangan Sing-cng Swe-weyn mnhdu muyas. Kngkawas 20 cida, François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande u ngalan France Laqi Muyas Ryeyn-he-huy Cu-si. Kndusan niya sey-ji Sya-kay-tang Tu1 Su-ki Kndadax Qnlhangan Sing-cng Swey-weyn mnhdu muyas daw, mtmay France Sn-ci Ho-ying ka François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande, seymung sey-ki-ning Sn-ci Kong-kong mi s-jn ci-ko. Musa nanaq tumal François Mitlang kngkawas 1974 cida ini pndungus niya Soto seyng-kyo ka mwaya balay mtmay cng-tan niya François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande. Kngkawas 1979 cida, 25 knkawas ka Hollande u mndungus bay tumal Farance Sya-kay-tang, kngkawas 1981 cida mpdudul Sya-kay-tang Miterang ka c-cng daw, huya balay usa Ko-ko-min Gi-kay ka hiya uri da (wada ini baka nhiti Paw-so-pay Soto Yakobu Sihak). Mniq babaw kcka kngkawas, François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande brah han u mniq seyhu tnualang qnpah han, bukuy daw kngkawas 1988 cida wada mndungus bay mangal Ko-ko-min Gi-kay gi-ying, hiti bay daw wada ngalan Sya-kay-tang Tu1 Su-ki. Mniq qpahun hiyi ka François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande u snpeyyah kngkawas 1997 dhuq kngkawas 2008 cida, kiya ka bnsiyaq bay ngalan qpahun Suki niya Sya-kay-tang ka hiya. Mniq kngkawas 2007 seyngkyo cida, François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande u ida balay bay ngalan Soto ho-sweyn-jn uri han, binaw Sya-kay-tang hiti bay daw wada umau tnhiqan niya qmpah cuxal (mnsupu hiya niqan 4 laqi na bubu) Segolene Royal. Kngkawas 2011 cida, wada malax mpseyng-kyo ka ida bay mpdudul mptalang niya ka Tominik Straws-Kaen (Kwo-ci Hwo-pi Ci-cin Cu-c brah ri-ji), François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande u wada mbiyax Sya-kay-tang kndadax cbiyaw mwaya bay muda kcka tang muda seyng-kyo. Soto seyng-kyo Kngkawas 2011 idas 10 diyax 16, François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande pa mniq kcka tang-ney cu-sweyn cida, mndungus bay phyuwan So-to ho-sweyn-jn. Kngkawas 2012 Soto France seyng-kyo, idas 4 diyax 22 tumn1 meytaq hyo cida, François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande u tu1 knou ka mnangal niya hyo (28.63%), mnsupu nngalan So-to cida ka Sakci u (27.18%) mtmay tumn2 meytaq hyo. Kngkawas 2012 idas 5 diyax 6, France u muda Soto seyng-kyo tumn2 meytaq hyo cida, François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande ka wada tu1 knou mnangal hyo (51.64%), wada niya ini baka ka mnSo-to cida ka Sakci, wada mnTu24 jn So-to France, hiya uri u wada mnTu5 Kong-he lmutuc Mitrang (kngkawas 1981 dhuq kngkawas 1995) daw tu2 tuiwil pay niya So-to, mnhdu tunarac pay 17 knkawas na c-cng. Kndusan niya Soto Kngkawas 2012 idas 5 diyax 15, Elysee Kong u muda knpriyux qpahun Soto mi psdhu qpahun, François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande mndungus bay wada mFrance Kong-hkwo Tu24 jn So-to mi Tu5 Kong-hkwo beytaq saya tu2 tuiwil palic niya So-to. Bukuy daw, François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande pa wada phiyu sediq Sya-kay-tang Jean-Marc Ayrault ngalan niya burah Cong-ri, kiya mi spuda waya seyng-kyo, mniq 34 hiyi ka kcka Bu-cyo u phiyu dmka ka Bu-cyo qridin, pdungus mntna biyax ka qridin mi snaw, kiya mi pusa kari So-to mi dBu-cyo u hdlun 30% ka pila snduwan dha. François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande mi Sya-kay-tang pnosa dha kari u knkana ou pila sediq u malun jey-king, krinah balay qmlahang quri key-jay, (wada pkrnaun brah niya) lihun ka knkawas mnhdu msangay qpahun mi pndungus waya quri Tong-sing hwen-in. Babaw niya daw, François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande pa prading pkdudul quri cng-ce niya, lmutuc smruwa quri hmrinas 100 knbkiyan pila O-co na ou pila sediq dmudul pbrnaun mangal 75% na jey-king, kiya miwada mndungus bay pwaya. Binaw so ini qbsiyaq daw pnwaya niyi pa wada pswaun ho-ying smliq waya keyng-po ka kiya, kiya u muda pkla kari u musa ini biyaw muda dmudul pkdungus waya keyng-po niya pkrana jey- king niya cng-ce, binaw hiti balay daw wada niya plixan da. Cida dungan u, muda pkla kari tbrnahun dhuq 60 knkawas ka knkawas mnhdu qmpah. Kngkawas 2012 idas 10 ka muda pkla kari dmudul Tong-sing hwen-in he- fa-hwa. France Tong-sing hwen-in mniq hiti daw hbaraw bay tuiwil pay kwo-hwey gi-yingt dmkuh cida mi wada pdaun, mniq kngkawas 2013 idas 6 mndungus bay pdungus waya, binaw cida u wada knbeyhing bay prngawan kari knkana sya-kay. Mniq quri waycyaw pa, alaw mpdakur Islam ci-twan cu-yi fen-c mniq tudaya Mari mkksa, François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande u key-tey snkaul heytay dmayaw seyhu Mari mangal pnrdangal dxral, kiya u wada mndungus bay dmayaw seyhu Mari mangal duma dxral tudaya alang mkbrnux. François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande uri u mniq kngkawas 2013 idas 2 musa Mari homung, muda pkla kari heytay France u uxay mpkbsiyaq mniq hiya, kiya mi rmngaw ya bay mkpiya iyax sngayan daw musa ka heytay dha da. Niqan ka mnuda qmita uuda niyi u, snkaul heytay musa Mari u niqan dyawan niya muda sndhu dndulan France mniq brah dxral qmnlahang dha cuxal, kiya mi niqan dnyawan niya quri hnyuwan niya niqan bay knrmnan niya ka François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande. Kndadax 2012 mbiyax seyng-kyo daw, François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande na diyax iyax qpahun So-to u mqraqil balay. Iyax c-cng cida s-yey-ryu mi key-jay ntanah ji ka mkala, snpeyyah ney-ke niya knkluwanan mqnaqah ndan u wada mrana smliq hnyuwan niya uri. Dhuq kngkawas 2014 idas 9 cida, knkuhan ryu niya François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande pa wada mlih dhuq 13% balay da——Tu5 Kong-hkwo na kntruma balay ndanan. Kndusan niya nanaq François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande dhuq saya u ini uda msturung nina, kiya ka tu1 ini angal qridin na Soto France; mnrngal kari ka hiya: `Msturung mi ini psturung u txtaxa nanaq sediq ka muda umau'. François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande u ini pskuraw, snburah, mlu balay, mriq tiping papak otobay musa qmpah mi mmusa sapah; ida balay pnngalan dha adana hangan `Flanby pay na Cyw-tang Pu-ting'ka hiya han, bukuy niya daw alaw muda pkdhu pndungus hiyi, wada niya plixan ka kuxul niya balay uqun cuxal ka cyaw-kri tang-kaw; wawi wawi doriq niya brah han u so kndux wawi ku-pan fong-ke han, saya daw wada niya pryuxan s-sang fong-ke na u-kwang wawi doriq da. Spuda France niqan taxa sing-bung mey-ti ka muda tmseyyax kari, François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande pa niqan nanaq mpsaqic snunux niya, knkingal idas u dalih 1 knbkiyan pila O-weyn ka snduwan niya bbuway mpsaqic tunux niya mi pprngawan balay kari sediq, hbaraw balay knou qnlhangan sing-bung mey-ti ka cwaqn-cay. Kngkawas 1978 dhuq kngkawas 2007 cida, ya bay 30 knkawas tnhiqan niya ka dangi niya mntna hiya sey-ji jn-wu uri ka Segolene Royal, mnsupyu tnquli 4 laqi: Thomas (kngkawas 1984-), Clémence (kngkawas 1985-), Julien (kngkawas 1987-) mi Flora (kngkawas 1992-), kngkawasw 2007 babaw So-to seyng-kyo daw wada ptalax. Kngkawas 2007 cida, muda pkla kari msupu tuhuy c-sn sey-ji ki-sya Curi Cyaye prading msdangi, kngkawas 2012 wada phyuwan Soto ka François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande dawbalay bay mndungus Tu1 Fu-jn ka qridin hiyi. Knkawas 2012 idas 5 diyax 11, sey-hu France u muda pkla kari François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande u muda sn-paw k-jn jay-sang c-ryaw, kiya u jay-sang niya nanaq pa hmrinas 117 knbkiyan pila O-co. Kngkawas 2014 idas 1 diyax 25, François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande u muda pkla kari wada ptalax ka dangi niya Warayri Cwewere tnhiqan niya 7 knkawas. Kngkawas 2014 idas 5 diyax 2, niqan ka mey-ti muda pkla François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande pa tuhuy dangi niya qridin pnrngawan hayo Curi Cyaye mnou balay pkmalu mniq So-to-hu Elysee Kong.

= François Hollande = Mntocing hngkawas 1954 idas 8 jiyax 12 ka François Hollande ga, empklaw ka hiya. Bokong klwaan France ta sayang o kiya ka François Hollande, pnaah hngkawas 2012 idas 5 jiyax 15 pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. His presidential term ended on 14 May 2017. = François Hollande = François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande (kari Franse: François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande; kngkawas 1954 idas 8 diyax 12－), France sey-ji jn-wo, kiya ka brah Soto Franse mi An-taw-r Cing-wang. Ngalan Franse Sya-kay-tang poso mpdodol niya ori, mnngalan Sya-kay-tang To1 So-ki (tang-kwey) hmrinas 10 knkawas. Kngkawas 2012 Franse So-to seyng-kyo cida mniq tomn2 meytaq hyo wada niya ini baka ka Nikora Sakeci, wada mangal So-to Franse to24 jn So-to Franse, wada mnFarance To5 Konghe dhoq saya to2 toiwil palic So-to ka François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande. Kngkawas 2016 idas 12 diyax 1 cida, alaw msngari 4% balay ka c-cng man-yi-to François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande, kiya ori o wada dha ngalan To5 Kong-he ini balay qrasi na So-to ka hiya. So kiya daw so oxay mtdha ka Toiwil pay, kiya ori o rmngaw kari｀Ida snbeyhing balay qori qnbliqan qnlhangan ka pllayon lmngelong', François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande pa wada so qnnaqah bay koxol niya kasi palix lmotoc qpahon So-to, wada balay snpeyyah babaw ndanan Tomn2 Knbeyhing Mccbo Qnlangan dhoq cida qnlhangan Franse mwaya balay malax nanaq mplotoc qpahon niya So-to. Ndan coxal Kngkawas 1954 cida, François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande pa mntoting todaya Farance alang mkbrnox Rooen, tama niya o ising mpqita narox birac mi mohing mi welo, mntomal 60 kngkkawas ooda Soto seyngkyo, kiya ka cida mpdkoh tonarac balay pay ho-sweyn-jn. Bobo niya ka mpdkoh toiwil pay na sya-kay mpqpah niya. Kngkawasw 1968 cida, mosa thdil Paris ka tnsapah niya François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande, mosa mniq Paris mkdoriq knsblayaq na balay alang mkbrnox Neoilly. Hana balay han o mniq Paste moyas pyasan tokcka, hiti daw mniq Pyasan Tobeyhing To2 Paris mangal ho-ri-co swey-s swey-wey. Kiya mi lmotoc mangal s-keyng nniqan bay hnhangan na Franse Pyasan Tokaw-tng HEC mi Paris Sey-ji Swe-weyn Science Po lmotoc moyas dongan. Bokoy daw wada mangal s-keyng Qnlhangan Sing-cng Swey-weyn L'ENA. Kngkawas 1980 cida, wada mangal to7 pnyasan (Voltaire Kay) kndadax Qnlhangan Sing-cng Swe-weyn mnhdo moyas. Kngkawas 20 cida, François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande o ngalan France Laqi Moyas Ryeyn-he-hoy Co-si. Kndosan niya sey-ji Sya-kay-tang To1 So-ki Kndadax Qnlhangan Sing-cng Swey-weyn mnhdo moyas daw, mtmay France Sn-ci Ho-ying ka François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande, seymong sey-ki-ning Sn-ci Kong-kong mi s-jn ci-ko. Mosa nanaq tomal François Mitlang kngkawas 1974 cida ini pndongos niya Soto seyng-kyo ka mwaya balay mtmay cng-tan niya François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande. Kngkawas 1979 cida, 25 knkawas ka Hollande o mndongos bay tomal Farance Sya-kay-tang, kngkawas 1981 cida mpdodol Sya-kay-tang Miterang ka c-cng daw, hoya balay osa Ko-ko-min Gi-kay ka hiya ori da (wada ini baka nhiti Paw-so-pay Soto Yakobo Sihak). Mniq babaw kcka kngkawas, François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande brah han o mniq seyho tnoalang qnpah han, bokoy daw kngkawas 1988 cida wada mndongos bay mangal Ko-ko-min Gi-kay gi-ying, hiti bay daw wada ngalan Sya-kay-tang To1 So-ki. Mniq qpahon hiyi ka François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande o snpeyyah kngkawas 1997 dhoq kngkawas 2008 cida, kiya ka bnsiyaq bay ngalan qpahon Soki niya Sya-kay-tang ka hiya. Mniq kngkawas 2007 seyngkyo cida, François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande o ida balay bay ngalan Soto ho-sweyn-jn ori han, binaw Sya-kay-tang hiti bay daw wada omao tnhiqan niya qmpah coxal (mnsopo hiya niqan 4 laqi na bobo) Segolene Royal. Kngkawas 2011 cida, wada malax mpseyng-kyo ka ida bay mpdodol mptalang niya ka Tominik Straws-Kaen (Kwo-ci Hwo-pi Ci-cin Co-c brah ri-ji), François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande o wada mbiyax Sya-kay-tang kndadax cbiyaw mwaya bay moda kcka tang moda seyng-kyo. Soto seyng-kyo Kngkawas 2011 idas 10 diyax 16, François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande pa mniq kcka tang-ney co-sweyn cida, mndongos bay phyowan So-to ho-sweyn-jn. Kngkawas 2012 Soto France seyng-kyo, idas 4 diyax 22 tomn1 meytaq hyo cida, François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande o to1 knoo ka mnangal niya hyo (28.63%), mnsopo nngalan So-to cida ka Sakci o (27.18%) mtmay tomn2 meytaq hyo. Kngkawas 2012 idas 5 diyax 6, France o moda Soto seyng-kyo tomn2 meytaq hyo cida, François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande ka wada to1 knoo mnangal hyo (51.64%), wada niya ini baka ka mnSo-to cida ka Sakci, wada mnTo24 jn So-to France, hiya ori o wada mnTo5 Kong-he lmotoc Mitrang (kngkawas 1981 dhoq kngkawas 1995) daw to2 toiwil pay niya So-to, mnhdo tonarac pay 17 knkawas na c-cng. Kndosan niya Soto Kngkawas 2012 idas 5 diyax 15, Elysee Kong o moda knpriyox qpahon Soto mi psdho qpahon, François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande mndongos bay wada mFrance Kong-hkwo To24 jn So-to mi To5 Kong-hkwo beytaq saya to2 toiwil palic niya So-to. Bokoy daw, François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande pa wada phiyo sediq Sya-kay-tang Jean-Marc Ayraolt ngalan niya borah Cong-ri, kiya mi spoda waya seyng-kyo, mniq 34 hiyi ka kcka Bo-cyo o phiyo dmka ka Bo-cyo qridin, pdongos mntna biyax ka qridin mi snaw, kiya mi posa kari So-to mi dBo-cyo o hdlon 30% ka pila sndowan dha. François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande mi Sya-kay-tang pnosa dha kari o knkana oo pila sediq o malon jey-king, krinah balay qmlahang qori key-jay, (wada pkrnaon brah niya) lihon ka knkawas mnhdo msangay qpahon mi pndongos waya qori Tong-sing hwen-in. Babaw niya daw, François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande pa prading pkdodol qori cng-ce niya, lmotoc smrowa qori hmrinas 100 knbkiyan pila O-co na oo pila sediq dmodol pbrnaon mangal 75% na jey-king, kiya miwada mndongos bay pwaya. Binaw so ini qbsiyaq daw pnwaya niyi pa wada pswaon ho-ying smliq waya keyng-po ka kiya, kiya o moda pkla kari o mosa ini biyaw moda dmodol pkdongos waya keyng-po niya pkrana jey- king niya cng-ce, binaw hiti balay daw wada niya plixan da. Cida dongan o, moda pkla kari tbrnahon dhoq 60 knkawas ka knkawas mnhdo qmpah. Kngkawas 2012 idas 10 ka moda pkla kari dmodol Tong-sing hwen-in he- fa-hwa. France Tong-sing hwen-in mniq hiti daw hbaraw bay toiwil pay kwo-hwey gi-yingt dmkoh cida mi wada pdaon, mniq kngkawas 2013 idas 6 mndongos bay pdongos waya, binaw cida o wada knbeyhing bay prngawan kari knkana sya-kay. Mniq qori waycyaw pa, alaw mpdakor Islam ci-twan co-yi fen-c mniq todaya Mari mkksa, François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande o key-tey snkaol heytay dmayaw seyho Mari mangal pnrdangal dxral, kiya o wada mndongos bay dmayaw seyho Mari mangal doma dxral todaya alang mkbrnox. François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande ori o mniq kngkawas 2013 idas 2 mosa Mari homong, moda pkla kari heytay France o oxay mpkbsiyaq mniq hiya, kiya mi rmngaw ya bay mkpiya iyax sngayan daw mosa ka heytay dha da. Niqan ka mnoda qmita ooda niyi o, snkaol heytay mosa Mari o niqan dyawan niya moda sndho dndolan France mniq brah dxral qmnlahang dha coxal, kiya mi niqan dnyawan niya qori hnyowan niya niqan bay knrmnan niya ka François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande. Kndadax 2012 mbiyax seyng-kyo daw, François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande na diyax iyax qpahon So-to o mqraqil balay. Iyax c-cng cida s-yey-ryo mi key-jay ntanah ji ka mkala, snpeyyah ney-ke niya knklowanan mqnaqah ndan o wada mrana smliq hnyowan niya ori. Dhoq kngkawas 2014 idas 9 cida, knkohan ryo niya François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande pa wada mlih dhoq 13% balay da——To5 Kong-hkwo na kntroma balay ndanan. Kndosan niya nanaq François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande dhoq saya o ini oda mstorong nina, kiya ka to1 ini angal qridin na Soto France; mnrngal kari ka hiya: `Mstorong mi ini pstorong o txtaxa nanaq sediq ka moda omao'. François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande o ini pskoraw, snborah, mlo balay, mriq tiping papak otobay mosa qmpah mi mmosa sapah; ida balay pnngalan dha adana hangan `Flanby pay na Cyw-tang Po-ting'ka hiya han, bokoy niya daw alaw moda pkdho pndongos hiyi, wada niya plixan ka koxol niya balay oqon coxal ka cyaw-kri tang-kaw; wawi wawi doriq niya brah han o so kndox wawi ko-pan fong-ke han, saya daw wada niya pryoxan s-sang fong-ke na o-kwang wawi doriq da. Spoda France niqan taxa sing-bong mey-ti ka moda tmseyyax kari, François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande pa niqan nanaq mpsaqic snonox niya, knkingal idas o dalih 1 knbkiyan pila O-weyn ka sndowan niya bboway mpsaqic tonox niya mi pprngawan balay kari sediq, hbaraw balay knoo qnlhangan sing-bong mey-ti ka cwaqn-cay. Kngkawas 1978 dhoq kngkawas 2007 cida, ya bay 30 knkawas tnhiqan niya ka dangi niya mntna hiya sey-ji jn-wo ori ka Segolene Royal, mnsopyo tnqoli 4 laqi: Thomas (kngkawas 1984-), Clémence (kngkawas 1985-), Jolien (kngkawas 1987-) mi Flora (kngkawas 1992-), kngkawasw 2007 babaw So-to seyng-kyo daw wada ptalax. Kngkawas 2007 cida, moda pkla kari msopo tohoy c-sn sey-ji ki-sya Cori Cyaye prading msdangi, kngkawas 2012 wada phyowan Soto ka François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande dawbalay bay mndongos To1 Fo-jn ka qridin hiyi. Knkawas 2012 idas 5 diyax 11, sey-ho France o moda pkla kari François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande o moda sn-paw k-jn jay-sang c-ryaw, kiya o jay-sang niya nanaq pa hmrinas 117 knbkiyan pila O-co. Kngkawas 2014 idas 1 diyax 25, François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande o moda pkla kari wada ptalax ka dangi niya Warayri Cwewere tnhiqan niya 7 knkawas. Kngkawas 2014 idas 5 diyax 2, niqan ka mey-ti moda pkla François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande pa tohoy dangi niya qridin pnrngawan hayo Cori Cyaye mnoo balay pkmalo mniq So-to-ho Elysee Kong.
